Title: Basic Law for Idiots
Description: Boozy Badger, a licensed attorney, goes over basic concepts of criminal and civil law in an entertaining and sometimes profane ask and answer method

Title: Being Disabled In Furry Fandom
Description: At this panel, we will discuss what it's like to be disabled in the furry fandom. All are welcome, disabled or not, to better learn what can be done to make the furry fandom accessible to everyone!

Title: Budget Record Night
Description: We buy records for $1 that we've never heard of, with the weirdest covers we can find, then play them on stream and learn about what we found. It's funny, I promise.

Title: Citrine In Concert
Description: Join us for an hour of original music from the fandom’s own blind singing husky.

Title: Color with Quack Quack Honk
Description: I will have a piece of line art posted to my social media for people to download. I’ll be coloring it while I talk about techniques and walk you through how I do my marker art.

Title: Convention War Stories
Description: What happens behind the closed doors of conventions? Sit back and listen to the stories that you were never meant to find out about from our panel of convention staff and board members. Enjoy the stories and find out why that cop was shaking his head well laughing.
Additional Hosts: Trying to get Kage to join me. Draggor is also invited.

Title: Create Characters With Bases
Description: Want to make characters but aren't confident in your skill level? Or do you want to make doing adoptables more quickly?  Pre-made bases might be just the answer for you! Learn how to use bases to make characters and get a free starter base!

Title: Cryptids and you
Description: Queuethulu and GotherineFoxx take a deep dive into strange cryptids of the internet and real life. Theyll help find you that potential new look for the summer too!

Title: D&D Self-Publishing Workshop
Description: Have you ever considered sharing your own TTRPG homebrew content with the world, for profit or pleasure? Join the host of CHAIRity D&D as he talks through his own time in the publishing world, and answers your questions about the creative process.

Title: Destiny for dummies
Description: Playing destiny 2 with people, explaining dumb lore, and having fun. Ending in some fun doodles based on the night.

Title: Divine Dragon Cannon
Description: Those dragon boys are back at it again.
Additional Hosts: Xzen, Zae, Penor Braccus, and Dolphinboy

Title: Draw Your Fursona Name in Maya Glyphs!
Description: Learn to translate your name into Maya hieroglyphs, draw it, and create a badge. You'll be able to leave this panel with a self-drawn art glyph with your fursona name. Marrok, the Wolf Archaeologist will guide you every step of the way!

Title: Entering the World of Darkness
Description: The World of Darkness is a horror TTRPG system in a magical realism setting where the players are the monsters. Join Alex White and our very special guest, Onyx Path freelance author Jacob Burgess, as they show you what it's like to go bump in the night!

Title: Furry Anatomy for Artists
Description: Learn the basics of furry anatomy. This panel has a focus on muzzles, paws, wings, tails and how they all fit together to make a furry.

Title: Furry Card Sharks
Description: The classic TV game of higher and lower—with a furry twist! Players predict how furry fans responded to poll questions, then test their luck against the cards. Winners play the Money Cards for HAWS!

Title: Furry Writers' Guild And You!
Description: If you're an aspiring author in the furry fandom the Furry Writers' Guild is a resource you shouldn't ignore! Come learn about the guild, what it does, and a bit about writing from the current FWG president.

Title: Fursona fight club
Description: I went to my first fursona fight club last night.  I got a bit late so I missed the first couple rules but I had a great time and I really recommend you come check it out.

Title: Gazzy’s Cavalcade of Fancy Cups
Description: You like fancy cups? Wanna know stuff about them and when to use them? Come spare a few minutes and let me be your guide to the magical world of Fancy Cups.

Title: Getting DooMed with Draggor
Description: A 1 hour version of my DooM open play server and podcast where I'll have a guest to interview.

Title: How to Draw Furries
Description: Learn how to draw furries, with tips and techniques suitable for beginners and intermediate artists.

Title: How To Get Published In Furry Anthologies
Description: Have you wanted to see your name in print but aren't ready to try and write then publish a full fledged novel? Get some insider tips from not only an author, but an anthology editor herself!

Title: I Comedy Better When I've had a Few
Description: You give money to the charity while we make you laugh.  Keeping giving money to the charity and we'll keep making you laugh.
Additional Hosts: Alkali, Boozy Badger, Pandez, and/or Ronnie

Title: Iggy's Got A Secret
Description: The classic panel game show with celebrity panelists and contestants plucked from the fandom to stump the panelists about their secrets or occupation!

Title: Loading Ready Run Presents: The Panalysts
Description: Looking for answers to some of life's most unpleasant dilemmas? LoadingReadyRun understands! We force teams of comedians to answer the ridiculous stuff you used to argue about in playgrounds. It's like high-school debate club, except intentionally funny.

Title: Keyotter's Jazz Happy Hour!
Description: Key the otter is ready to serenade you on the piano and accordion in this chill live music stream! Kick back and put your paws up for a mix of jazz tunes, video game music covers, and song requests from chat.

Title: Last Minute: Politics - Live recording of the world’s only furry podcast
Description: This is a live-taping of Last Minute Politics, the fandom’s only current event podcast. Join PepperCoyote, Xander, and Draggor to talk about the news, and most importantly, how to survive under the capitalist system of resource distribution. Heated Q and A to follow.

Title: Lawyer Horror Stories
Description: Come join Boozy as he shares stories from the legal world. From the mundane to the crazy, we have it all. Have questions? Come ask them and see our host go crazy.

Title: Let's Make a Game!
Description: Join in a design-by-committee game where you can suggest concepts and then vote on the result!  Will it be the next AAA title, or a concept salad destined for the bargain bin?

Title: Libation Appreciation
Description: Interview/discussion show about drinks with pre-submitted questions!

Title: Making Commission Art for Fun and Profit
Description: From a Terms of Service to Pricing, Serathin has been a commissioned writer for many years and ready to share his experiences to help navigate through the waters of being a commission artist.  Good whether doing it for fun, an extra bit of money, or to start a business!

Title: Making vrchat bullshit
Description: Firr and his friends will show you the basics of making a VRchat world, avatars, and much more!

Title: Marketing Furry Writing To Non-Furry Markets
Description: Did you write a story about an anthro animal and thought no one but furries would read it? WRONG! Learn how to market your works to non-furry audiences from published award winning author and Furry Writers' Guild president Linnea Capps!

Title: Mass-Debation
Description: A charity debate panel where you vote with your dollars. Three debates on irrelevant topics picked from the audience, argued irreverently by the panelists, with the audience picking the winner

Title: Otherkin and Therians and Alterhumans, Oh My!
Description: Meetup and discussion on otherkin, therians and alterhumans. Come and meet others that identify as these and other related identities to discuss this aspect of our lives.

Title: Pepper Coyote in concert
Description: Live music as performed by singer/guitarist Pepper Coyote! Hear original material, covers, and old stuff that hasn’t been heard in years. Or ever!

Title: Power, Consent, and Safety in RPGs
Description: Recently popularized safety tools used in RPGs have their roots in kink practices. Come join RPG creative and acclaimed kink educator Alex White to learn more about what DMs and players alike can learn about creating a safe and fun game from the dungeon's native residents!

Title: Red Pandas: The Master Species
Description: Learn about the glorious beings that are the Red Pandas! Be overwhelmed with the knowledge of why they reign supreme over all creatures, including humans!

Title: Science, Pseudoscience, and Outright Crap
Description: Homeopathic remedies?  Magnets?  Aromatherapy?  Let's examine these a little more closely, and let you decide for yourself what is sound science and what is outright crap.

Title: Scribbles N Bits
Description: "It was a dark and stormy night," except then it wasn't. We're furries; we can do better than Paul Clifford! Come join the game where , the audience proposes the next line of the story, and we all vote which line we like the best to become the next line in the story.

Title: Size Matters
Description: Talking about furries of unusual size: large and small. A panel discussion featuring the members of the Size Matters Podcast. Small as a mouse? Bigger than a house? That's what we're talking about.

Title: So, you want to start a convention, do you?
Description: There have been some well-publicized events in the last few years that were started with the best of intentions, but turned into monumental disasters that left their organizers (at best) penniless or (at worst) facing possible criminal charges.  Let's not have you join that list.

Title: Spirit Island
Description: It's Spirit Island.  We're going to play it in the discord tabletop space via Tabletop Simulator.

Title: Stepping Stones in Dreaming
Description: This panel is informational about how to achieve lucid dreaming from a practitioner.

Title: Super Password Plus
Description: The game of secret words! You and our celebrity guests team up to give the right clue to get your partner to say the secret word. Alkali also hates this game, need I say more.

Title: Tax Badger Tax Tips
Description: Join the Tax Badger while he goes over everything on the tax return, and offers some tips for your art business!

Title: The Art of Critique
Description: A helpful guide on what, when, why, and how to provide helpful critiques.

Title: The Blind Side
Description: Have you ever wondered what it is like to be blind in a sighted world? Join  Citrine Husky and Snowflake as they explain and show you the interesting aspects of being visually impaired

Title: The Dragget Show Live
Description: Join Xander the Dragon and Alkali the Ferret as these guys record their podcast live during the Fur Squared On Line Event.  Come watch as they talk about anything, everything, & nothing.

Title: The Great Game of Video Golf:  Draggor v Iggy for cash
Description: Draggor wants to lose some cash

Title: The Mini Derg Show
Description: This is the virtual show where Sky Draco talks about random times in his life dealt with and mainly being funny dragon.

Title: Tonya Song in Concert
Description: Tonya Song is a composer, pianist, and singer fandom. Her music is a vibrant mix of Native music, rock, latin, and classical. She will perform brand new original works as well as some covers, playing piano and singing as well as playing other instruments.

Title: Transformation Time
Description: Lycanthropes, Shapeshifters, and Changlings, oh my!  TF writer Serathin would like to spend some time talking all about Transformation, from triggers to types and everything in between.

Title: Trivia Night
Description: Let's all get in discord and play trivia!

Title: Uncle Kage's Story Hour
Description: Old guy drinks wine and makes face noises for an hour.

Title: Vocal Recording on a Budget
Description: Do you want to record vocals, but don't know where to start? I can help you with that! This panel will cover the basics of home vocal recording, and provide equipment suggestions for a variety of budgets. I'll teach you how to make your ideas a reality, without breaking the bank!

Title: Wait Wait Don't Firr Me
Description: A 'game show' for panelists and the audience based on 'current' events.

Title: Worldbuilding: Designing your fictional government
Description: Want to write a fantasy setting not simply ruled by vague "lords?" Got questions on how to run a galactic empire? Come see experienced worldbuilder Joel Kreissman's panel on developing a functional fictional government.

Title: Writing for Furries
Description: Anthropomorphic characters are a mainstay in many books, and whether you're just curious on how to do so yourself or are looking to author your own story this is the place to go to talk about how to translate the fur to the word!
